channel.title: MeMeScape | 24/7 | Active players | Nice staff | Flawless webclient
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www.imgdumper.nl/uploads5/502ccf685fe41/502ccf685a868-Untitled-1.jpg[/img]
[b]WEBCLIENT!! NEW! JOIN NOW![/b] [b][url=http://www.memescape.byethost7.com/webclient.html]click here for webclient.[/url][/b]
[b]Goals:[/b] 100 vieuws: X 300 vieuws: X 500 vieuws: 1000 vieuws: 2500 vieuws:
[b] Features:[/b] 634 Items - Check Shop Picture 602 Npc's Summoning - Cats, Dogs, Penguin, Dragons [Dragons are donator only] Perfect Leeching Anims Flashing are fixed - hand cannon stance works without flashing Allot Of Shops - Check Shop Picture Good Bosses - Avatar Of Destruction and Penance Queen going to be added Trade Prices - Still working on good economy system. 100% Special emotes.
[b]Added/Fixex: [16-08-2012 14:10][/b] Added more shops Dragon in shops, pk shops, fury in shops, Added a Pk point system and shop. Added bank npc at home spawn. Fixed bosses drops. Trom demon can be hit now and they drop. Skeletions that where unviseble in trav dung are viseble now!
[b]Action![/b] Who joins now and invite 3 friends get 50m instant!
[b] Pictures: /Yes Im lazy i dont take much pics.[/b]
[b]Some of our shops![/b] [img]http://www.imgdumper.nl/uploads5/502ccf9903045/502ccf98e70b8-shops.jpg[/img] [b]Pets drops and follow![/b] [img]http://www.imgdumper.nl/uploads5/502ccfabc2af0/502ccfabb34c2-petswork.jpg[/img]
[b]We got many items on server.[/b] [img]http://www.imgdumper.nl/uploads5/502ccfb879483/502ccfb8736a8-Many_items%21.jpg[/img]
[b]We got all prayers working.[/b] [img]http://www.imgdumper.nl/uploads5/502ccfc99d34f/502ccfc998d0f-Untitled-6.jpg[/img]
[b]Download link: http://www.mediafire.com/?irvt942iezvis44
This is our Second day online. Please enjoy our service. If you got any questions there is always someone ingame. I hope u like our server Please join us :)![/b][/center]

[center]

WEBCLIENT!! NEW! JOIN NOW!
click here for webclient.

Goals:
100 vieuws: X
300 vieuws: X
500 vieuws:

2500 vieuws:


Features:
634 Items - Check Shop Picture
602 Npc’s
Summoning - Cats, Dogs, Penguin, Dragons [Dragons are donator only]
Perfect Leeching
Anims Flashing are fixed - hand cannon stance works without flashing
Allot Of Shops - Check Shop Picture
Good Bosses - Avatar Of Destruction and Penance Queen going to be added
Trade Prices - Still working on good economy system.
100% Special emotes.

Added/Fixex: [16-08-2012 14:10]
Added more shops Dragon in shops, pk shops, fury in shops,
Added a Pk point system and shop.
Added bank npc at home spawn.
Fixed bosses drops.
Trom demon can be hit now and they drop.
Skeletions that where unviseble in trav dung are viseble now!

Action!
Who joins now and invite 3 friends get 50m instant!


Pictures: /Yes Im lazy i dont take much pics.

Please enjoy our service.
